aboutMe.title: Student
aboutMe.name: Vitaly
aboutMe.bio: I graduated from a linguistic university in Moscow, then moved to Belgrade, Serbia, and started to study web development in JavaScript. I successfully completed my studies and got my diploma, and at the moment I am looking for a project where I can apply my acquired skills and knowledge. Not only that, but I'm the proud owner of a fat cat and a very good dog. My hobbies are tennis, running, and reading.

aboutProject.title: About the project
aboutProject.infoTitle1: The diploma project consisted of 5 stages
aboutProject.infoText1: Making a plan, working on the backend, layout, adding functionality, and final tweaks.
aboutProject.infoTitle2: The diploma took five weeks to complete
aboutProject.infoText2: Each stage had soft and hard deadlines that had to be met in order to successfully defend the project.

techs.title: Technologies
techs.subtitle: 7 techs
techs.brief: In the web development course, we learned the techniques that we applied to our diploma project.
